isis.stitle: HOOD, GRILLE AND FENDERS - 2000, 4000, 8000 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - 2000 SERIES HOOD

svcsubproc.title: 2500 and 2600 Model Original Hood - Remove

step1.para: Release hood latches on each side of the hood and tilt the hood assembly to a 45 degree angle. Support the tilted hood with a floor stand to relieve tension on the support spring assemblies, then detach the support spring assemblies as follows.
Refer to Figure 28 for items in parentheses.

step2.para: Remove the cotter pin (Item 1) (and washer, if so equipped) at the support spring bracket (Item 2) on top of the radiator (Item 3), driver and passenger side.
Pull out the retaining pin (Item 4) that secures the support spring assembly clevis (Item 5) to the support spring bracket (Item 2), driver and passenger side.

figure.caption: Figure 28. 2500 and 2600 Model Support Spring Assembly

step1.para: Disconnect front end wire harness connector and ground connections on the engine side of dash panel on the drivers side, also disconnect pigtail connectors along the front end wire harness. Remove wire harness clips and loop clamps securing the harness between dash panel and hood, as necessary. (The harness stays with the hood.)

If the vehicle has a International electronic engine, disconnect front end wire harness connectors near the rear of the engine on the drivers side, and ground connections. Remove wire harness clips and loop clamps securing the harness between the connectors and hood, as necessary. (The harness stays with the hood.)

svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 29 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: To remove the hood, remove the wire spring pin (Item 1) and flat washer (Item 2) from the hood hinge pin (Item 3), then remove the hinge pin from hood and chassis hinge sections (Items 4 and 5), passenger side shown.
Repeat procedure to remove the driver side hood hinge pin.
With an assistant, remove the hood assembly. Place the hood on an appropriate padded surface to protect painted surfaces.

svcsubproc.title: 2500 and 2600 Model Original Hood - Install
svcsubproc.para: If required, install support spring assemblies, splash panels, insulator panels and the hood hinge plates to the hood before installing it.
Refer to Figure 29 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: Place a padded work stand in front of the vehicle. With an assistant, rest the hood assembly on the work stand. Position the hood hinge section (Item 4) in place at the chassis hinge section (Item 5) and install the hood hinge pins (Item 3) from the outboard side into each hinge, passenger side shown.
Install flat washer (Item 2) on each of the hood hinge pins (Item 3) and secure with wire spring pins (Item 1), passenger side shown.

Connect front end wire harness connector and ground connections to the appropriate engine side dash panel connectors on the drivers side, also connect pigtail connectors along the front end wire harness. Secure the wire harness with the clips and loop clamps provided, as necessary.

If the vehicle has a International electronic engine, connect front end wire harness connectors near the rear of the engine on drivers side, and ground connections. Install wire harness clips and loop clamps securing the harness between the connectors and hood, as necessary.

Carefully tilt the hood to a 45 degree angle. Support the tilted hood with a floor stand to relieve tension on the support spring assemblies, then attach the support spring assemblies to the mounting brackets on top of the radiator as follows.
Refer to Figure 28 for items in parentheses.

step2.para: Position the support spring assembly clevis (Item 5) at the support spring bracket (Item 2) on top of the radiator (Item 3, driver and passenger side.
Install the retaining pin (Item 4) (and washer, if so equipped), securing the support spring assembly clevis (Item 5) to the support spring bracket (Item 2), driver and passenger side.
Install the cotter pin (Item 1) in the retaining pin (Item 4) securing the retaining pin at the support spring bracket (Item 2), driver and passenger side.

step1.para: Close the hood and latch the hood on both sides.

svcsubproc.title: 2600 Model Aerodynamic Hood (After March, 1996) - Remove

step1.para: Release hood latches on each side of the hood and tilt the hood assembly to a 45 degree angle. Support the tilted hood with a floor stand to relieve tension on the tilt assist and support spring assemblies, then detach the tilt assist and support spring assemblies as follows.
Refer to Figure 30 for items in parentheses.

step2.para: Remove the cotter pin (Item 1) (and washer, if so equipped) at the tilt assist and support spring bracket (Item 2) on top of the radiator (Item 3), driver and passenger side.
Pull out the retaining pin (Item 4) that secures the tilt assist and support spring assembly clevis (Item 5) to the tilt assist and support spring bracket (Item 2), driver and passenger side.
